issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Title is not shown until control is toggled in title.
This is not regression since the issue occurs in 2.1.3 as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to Kitchensink> Controls> Slider> basic.
2. Observer title bar.
3. Click on 'toggle slider in Title' two times.

Actual:
2. There is no title.
3. Title is there in the title bar.

Expected:
Title should be there in the title bar both of the times.
fields.summary: iOS: Kitchensink - Title is not shown until control is toggled in title.

comments.body:
Controls> Activity Indicator has the same issue.
Title is shown after Show Indicator(Title)is toggled.

Not a regression, occurs in 3.0.0.GA

Tested with:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201301281948
Titanium SDK, build: 3.0.2.v20130129171611
Devices:
iPad4 iOS 6.1
iPad2 iOS 5.1

Can't reproduce this issue in Controls> Activity indicator in:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.0.201304052347
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.0.v20130405170202
Devices:
iPad 4 iOS 6.1.3
iPhone5 iOS 6.1.3

Originally reported issue: Title changes from "Basic" to "Slider"
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
